testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to access the "Homework" page and make changes to my assignments When entering the Student Panel
testcase.name: The user should be able to view column fields in the "Upcoming Homework" segment
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed Then The user verifies that, the Login button is visible on the homepage....passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed Then The user verifies that Login button redirects to the userlogin page....passed And The user enters their "username" in to the username textbox.............passed And The user enters their "password" in to the password textbox.............passed When The user clicks on the Sign In button..................................passed Then The user verifies that they are on the student panel...................passed When The user clicks on the Homework button link on student panel...........passed Then The user verifies that, on the homework page, column fields in the Upcoming Homework segment are visible..passed
